long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the extension of our application, https://fwd.wiki. There are many features that we offer as part of this extension, Fwd: Extension. This extension also offers Google Meet Attendance Report.

A "New Tab" that should your favourites quotes with a beautiful background image. A Popup with Motivational Quotes & Fascinating Facts.

Fwd: Text, Fwd: Link, Fwd: Image, Fwd: Capture - save data from any website you visit to Fwd: Wiki. 

Google Meet Attendance Report (With AutoAdmit/No Dependencies)
You can organise your Meets into Groups - add | edit | delete
Download report in HTML file or Push to Fwd: Wiki

for more details, please visit: https://fwd.wiki/collections/fwd-extension
